section.audio_text: Welcome to this differences lesson between the 737NG and 737 MAX Speed Trim System (STS). Upon completion of this course, you will be able to: identify the different functions of the Speed Trim System, understand the purpose of the Maneuvering Characteristics Augmentation System (MCAS) function and when it operates,
understand the function of the SPEED TRIM FAIL light, understand the function of the STAB TRIM cutout switches and identify how to override the Speed Trim System.
